mapper.select: select * from advice where state!='상담완료' order by no desc
mapper.update: update advice set name=#{name}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, state=#{state}, secret=#{secret}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, reply=#{reply}, reply_date=#{reply_date}, memo=#{memo}, upload_origin=#{upload_origin}, upload_stored=#{upload_stored} where no=#{no}
update advice set upload_origin=#{upload_origin}, upload_stored=#{upload_stored} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select * from advice where quick_state='x' order by no desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}
select * from advice where quick_state='o' order by no desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}
select count(no) from advice where quick_state='x'
select count(no) from advice where quick_state='o'
